name: @azora/services
description: Azora OS Microservices - Ubuntu Philosophy in Action

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:core" "npm run start:infrastructure" "npm run start:integration" "npm run start:advanced"
scripts.start:core: concurrently "npm run start:ai-family" "npm run start:sapiens" "npm run start:mint" "npm run start:forge"
scripts.start:infrastructure: concurrently "npm run start:lms" "npm run start:nexus" "npm run start:analytics" "npm run start:aegis"
scripts.start:integration: concurrently "npm run start:master-ui" "npm run start:mobile" "npm run start:api-integration" "npm run start:database" "npm run start:devops" "npm run start:testing"
scripts.start:advanced: concurrently "npm run start:ui-enhancement" "npm run start:documentation" "npm run start:blockchain" "npm run start:ai-ml" "npm run start:enterprise" "npm run start:global"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:infrastructure" "npm run dev:integration"
scripts.dev:core: concurrently "npm run dev:ai-family" "npm run dev:sapiens" "npm run dev:mint" "npm run dev:forge"
scripts.dev:infrastructure: concurrently "npm run dev:lms" "npm run dev:nexus" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:aegis"
scripts.dev:integration: concurrently "npm run dev:master-ui" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:api-integration" "npm run dev:database" "npm run dev:devops" "npm run dev:testing"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:core && npm run test:infrastructure && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:core: npm run test:ai-family && npm run test:sapiens && npm run test:mint && npm run test:forge
scripts.test:infrastructure: npm run test:lms && npm run test:nexus && npm run test:analytics && npm run test:aegis
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:master-ui && npm run test:mobile && npm run test:api-integration && npm run test:database && npm run test:devops && npm run test:testing
scripts.install:all: npm run install:core && npm run install:infrastructure && npm run install:integration
scripts.install:core: npm run install:ai-family && npm run install:sapiens && npm run install:mint && npm run install:forge
scripts.install:infrastructure: npm run install:lms && npm run install:nexus && npm run install:analytics && npm run install:aegis
scripts.install:integration: npm run install:master-ui && npm run install:mobile && npm run install:api-integration && npm run install:database && npm run install:devops && npm run install:testing
scripts.build:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:infrastructure && npm run build:integration
scripts.build:core: npm run build:ai-family && npm run build:sapiens && npm run build:mint && npm run build:forge
scripts.build:infrastructure: npm run build:lms && npm run build:nexus && npm run build:analytics && npm run build:aegis
scripts.build:integration: npm run build:master-ui && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:api-integration && npm run build:database && npm run build:devops && npm run build:testing

author: Azora ES (Pty) Ltd
